metadata.title: CVE-2014-3782 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple incomplete blacklist vulnerabilities in thefilemanager::isFileExclude method in the Media Manager in Dotclear before2.6.3 allow remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary PHP code byuploading a file with a (1) double extension or (2) .php5, (3) .phtml, orsome other PHP file extension.

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
